section.p: You come to a man-made hollow in the ground. In the middle is a shrine, bedecked with offerings from nomad worshippers, and covered in symbols of the god Tambu, Great Spirit of the Steppes. The wind howls all around, buffeting you from all directions. You have found the Fane of the Four Winds.

If you have the codeword Cull, .
If not, if you are an initiate of Tambu, .
Otherwise, read on.
You notice some of the offerings are quite valuable.
